p: A total of 0.1 gram of the aqueous extract was solubilized in 3 mL of chloroform. A volume of 3 mL of acetic anhydride has been added, and the solution was frozen for 3 min. One drop of concentrated sulfuric acid was added. The presence of triterpenoid was confirmed by the appearance of a red-violated color, while that of sterols was indicated by a successive appearance of blue, green, red, and orange colors [ 30].
